action.primary: Astringes leakage of Blood and stops bleeding

indications: Bleeding, especially epistaxis and uterine bleeding
Topically for sores or burns that have already ulcerated

contraindications: Use with caution for those with weak digestive systems.

useCases: Excessive uterine bleeding due to Deficiency.
Hematochezia with Middle Jiao Deficiency Cold.
Hemorrhoidal bleeding with bright red Blood.

notes: This herb is human hair that has been processed with refined coal and powdered.
This herb is considered to be both an astringent hemostatic and a Blood activating hemostatic.
When blown into the nose, nosebleed will stop immediately.
It treats foul-smelling Blood in the stool due to necrosis of the bowel.
It also treats amenorrhea and late periods.
It can be applied topically for bleeding gums.

Xue Yu Tan and Rx. Notoginseng #{SanQi} San Qi stop bleeding, reduce Blood Stasis and treat all types of bleeding. San Qi is stronger at stopping bleeding, reducing swelling and alleviating pain. Xue Yu Tan is less able to stop bleeding but can facilitate urination, generate flesh and assist in the healing of sores.
